website_summaries.verdict: If you don’t have the time to wash, slice, and serve garden-fresh blueberries, banana bits, and pear chunks to your prickly pal, this nutrition-packed hedgehog food mix is easily the next best option.
pros: Sun-dried bok choy, carrots, zucchini, green beans, peas, and apples are the first 6 ingredients
Easier than preparing fresh fruits and veggies
cons: Although your hedgehog will go nuts for this, it is a fairly pricey mix

customer_reviews.title: Great if your reptile eats it
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and easy to use but my tortoise won’t eat it. He’s picky so it might just be his bad attitude.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Charlie approves!
customer_reviews.text: My iguana is pretty picky (for an iguana) but he seems to run to this when I put it in his dish! That's a 2 thumbs up from Charlie, so I will be buying again. Shipping was incredibly fast as well
customer_reviews.author: M. Fazzio

customer_reviews.title: My turtle jus wouldnt eat this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on this & was so excited that my snapping turtle would be getting something to eat different than dried meal worms or live night crawlers. But she wouldnt eat any of this. I'm not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Bearded dragon approved!
customer_reviews.text: Our bearded dragon absolutely loves this mix! If he was being picky and not wanting to eat, all we have to do is offer him some of this mix and he’s back to happily chomping down his meals!
customer_reviews.author: GinnyLou

customer_reviews.title: Great for hedgehogs!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our new baby hedgehog. I was surprised to learn that this little guy had no interest in mealworms, so I searched online for some other kind of treat to give him. This was recommended for hedgehogs on another site, but I ordered it on Amazon for less. The baby hoglet LOVES it - so much, in fact, that the first time he tried it he put some on his head! 🤣
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: TORTOISE LOVES IT AND IT'S HEALTHY!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT ONLY IS THIS VERY HEALTHY AND EASY TO FEED MY RED FOOT TORTOISE BUT SHE LOVES IT TOO!! WE BOTH RECOMMEND THIS AND AS IT KEEPS HER HEALTHY AND HAPPY THERE IS NOTHING MORE YOU COULD ASK FROM A FOOD THAT A FINICKY, PICKY EATER LIKE HER LOVES TO EAT!!
customer_reviews.author: AlPennG

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Our bearded dragon really enjoyed this & ot was really easy to make. Plus it's full of vitamins she needs!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hartsell

customer_reviews.title: food munchies
customer_reviews.text: My two small turtles would not go near this. I have tried to feed it to them for a week with no results. It seems such a shame to throw away good money on something that you cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Chinese Water Dragon approved
customer_reviews.text: The only fruit/veggie brand my Chinese water dragon will eat! It has everything he needs and he’ll eat it when there’s Live bugs mixed In. Which is a relief since he won’t eat veggies any other way.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Langston

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise Can’t Eat Fast Enough
customer_reviews.text: My Hermanns tortoise can’t seem to eat this fast enough. Will definitely be buying it again soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great! Except...
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. It was cheaper on Amazon than in my local pet store so I bought some. Contents of the bag were smashed up into little bits and dust, and my beardie doesn't like small bits. So now I prefer to buy a bag I can see first.
customer_reviews.author: spitinkitten

customer_reviews.title: To much bok choy.
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing but bok choy stems. Very little fruit or actual vegetables in it. Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Cook

customer_reviews.title: My turtles wouldn't eat it
customer_reviews.text: I only have outside Florida box turtles that I feed. They wouldn't eat it. I cannot tell you how it is for other animals
customer_reviews.author: Justlyn

customer_reviews.title: Box Turtle Approved
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my box turtle he absolutely love everything it in but cabbage so so reasonable priced
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Tortise likes it.happy tort
customer_reviews.text: My tortise loves this mixed assortment.its great with her other lettuce and mazuri pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pets love
customer_reviews.text: Very convient to use & makes having food on hand easy for bearded dragon and red foot tortise
customer_reviews.author: CarolynM

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise loves this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons tortoise, the tortoise loves this stuff & we love that the shipping was extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: TheFrenchieLady

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled turtle
customer_reviews.text: Since I haven't actually tasted it. I'm going by my turtle . She likes to hunt for the little pieces. Will only eat her fav pieces. Typical spoiled turtle.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Tort loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I mix with water. My baby tortoise seems to enjoy it. I only offer it every couple days. Plan on continuing to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise loves this
customer_reviews.text: My tortoise likes this sprinkled on his hay occasionally as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: AD2

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain
customer_reviews.text: Although my dragon doesn't really mess with this stuff, his feeder crickets and roaches devour it, so I figure he's eating it one way or another. My dragon is extremely picky though and won't eat much of anything unless it's running around in front of him. (although he does love bananas :P)
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: My tortoise LOVED this food
customer_reviews.text: My tortoise LOVED this food!!! The reason why I put 4 stars is because this food goes very quickly and it could be a little less money
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: my turtle doesn't like this.. except the carrots ☺️ the texture after hydration not so happy with that..
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for all small animals
customer_reviews.text: My rats LOVE this!! An easy way for them to get some fruits and veggies in their diet. Just make sure you throw any uneaten food away because it stinks after a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Bennett

customer_reviews.title: My Box turtle will not eat this food
customer_reviews.text: My box turtle will not eat this. It is a great value and price. I am disappointed she will not eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle6

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Bearded Dragons.
customer_reviews.text: Used about a half of a bag and my Bearded Dragons won't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: kent w irish

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a very good product
customer_reviews.text: Our small lizard seems to really like and eat this food. Seems to be performing much better now since switching over from pet store junk.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good - dried food never has as much nutrients as regular but it does well in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Reads

customer_reviews.title: Boxturtle didn’t go for it
customer_reviews.text: Thought my box turtle would like this mixture but he avoids it. The canned box turtle fruit and veggie mix he loves but wont touch this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Derek K.

customer_reviews.title: Bunny approved
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit likes it. Easy to put together. Just add water.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannan Walter

customer_reviews.title: Hammy approves
customer_reviews.text: I find this an easier way for my hamsters to get their fruits and veg
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Mae

customer_reviews.title: my box turtle did not like
customer_reviews.text: my box turtle didn't like. she doesn't like smooshy food. she ate a few small ones not hydrated. will try again with not as much water.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ligh

customer_reviews.title: my breaded dragon loves
customer_reviews.text: Rex loves as a treat! will be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My tortoise doesnt touch it at all....!!!
customer_reviews.text: My tortoise doesn't touch it at all....!!! I have a baby leopard Tortoise and it would sniff but never eat this. Not sure if i am doing something wrong but i dont think it likes it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chokhawala

customer_reviews.title: My tortoise loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Good mix of fruits and vegetables, so I don’t have to cut up fresh items daily.
customer_reviews.author: J C M

customer_reviews.title: Last min meals
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces are super hard so you have to be carful. Even when you wet them they dont get much soft. My box turtle like the cut up green beans the best.
customer_reviews.author: **Cely**

customer_reviews.title: Rats Love It
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a rat food mix. My rats love the veggies and its the first thing they eat out of the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mix; box turtle hasn't attempted to eat it yet, and that will be the real test.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Like the convenience of it
customer_reviews.text: Like the convenience of it, but my 3-toed box turtle is not sure if she likes it yet! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: furialau

customer_reviews.title: Reptile food
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a large selection of reptile food where I live, so glad I can order it from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: mom of five

customer_reviews.title: Bearded Dragon Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: for our bearded dragon, he won't eat fresh vegetables- but he eats this
customer_reviews.author: C. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: My pet rats really loved these treats
customer_reviews.text: My pet rats really loved these treats! I mixed them with a little water and made them thick for them to enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Calandrelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received it in due time and good condition. My turtle loves it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ked

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Normally the packages I get are fine, but this past one, half the bag was just tiny crumbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red foot tortoises favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: My tortoise loved this. They even smell good. Great snack
customer_reviews.author: L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My ornate box turtle could not care less about this stuff. She only goes for fresh and/or alive food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i can mix just what I m need for a treat for my dragon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: used this before and ordered again, I think that speaks for itself! :)
customer_reviews.author: SMILES4ALL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper on Amazon then in pet stores. my tort loves it.
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Not very good mix. Almost all crushed to dust particles
customer_reviews.text: Not very good mix. Almost all crushed to dust particles. Hard pieces didn't soften to much.
customer_reviews.author: Rick A. Vauble

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My dragon is very picky so I didn't expect him to like it but it would have been nice if he did.
customer_reviews.author: BriannaBitchhhh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Bought it for my hermit crabs and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Bought it for my hermit crabs and they love it ! I even feed my pineapple conure a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nickole

product_meta.title: Zilla Reptile Food Munchies Vegetable & Fruit Mix, 4-Ounce
product_meta.description: Zilla reptile munchies fruit and vegetable mix is a quick and convenient way to provide reptiles a variety of desirable fruits and green vegetables they prefer. Select sun dried and freeze dried ingredients are specifically chosen for herbivorous reptiles. By using select freeze dried and sun dried ingredients, Zilla reptile munchies will more fully rehydrate while maintaining beneficial nutrients and appealing color.
feature_bullets: Nutritious, dehydrated ingredients that are quick and convenient - no refrigeration required!
Easy to prepare by simply rehydrating in water
Provides nutrition from a variety of natural ingredients
Ideal for bearded dragons, uromastyx, iguanas, tortoises, as well as birds and other small animals

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
